body_html:
Tried to run sample code using TF Relu API , but getting same issue -

x = np.zeros(2) + np.nan    // x = [nan nan]
sess.run(tf.nn.relu(tf.constant(x)))           # fails on ppc64le: [0. 0.] vs expected [nan nan]

I was debugging this issue and could able to reach at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.2.1/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py#L288

Now trying to understand apply_op function for Relu operation

body:
Tried to run sample code using TF Relu API , but getting same issue -

```
x = np.zeros(2) + np.nan    // x = [nan nan]
sess.run(tf.nn.relu(tf.constant(x)))           # fails on ppc64le: [0. 0.] vs expected [nan nan]
```
I was debugging this issue and could able to reach at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.2.1/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py#L288  

Now trying to understand apply_op function for Relu operation
